last_episode_to_air.name: The Big 30
last_episode_to_air.overview: Shahid's dream of his NGO school comes true but his friends don’t come through. Yavar begs Melroy to save him. Sheetal and Sameer’s marriage reaches a crossroad. A tryst with violence in the past ties the friends’ fates together but Preet’s 30th birthday party brings with it a revelation that throws them apart. As Rishabh’s life’s work burns to ashes, their life-long friendships are set ablaze.

name: Jee Karda
overview: Seven school friends -who thought that by the time they are 30 their life will be sorted- turn 30 to find that it’s a grand hot mess instead. They live, love, laugh, make mistakes, get their hearts broken, grow up a little but through it all discover that the best of friendships are imperfect and life is a luminous shade of grey.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Seven school friends -who thought that by the time they are 30 their life will be sorted- turn 30 to find that it’s a grand hot mess instead. They live, love, laugh, make mistakes, get their hearts broken, grow up a little but through it all discover that the best of friendships are imperfect and life is a luminous shade of grey.

episodes.name: Will you marry me?
episodes.overview: Seven childhood friends chance upon a fortune teller who leaves them confused with his strange advice. We jump to 2022 and the kids are in their 30s. Lavanya accepts to marry her true love, but is she ready? Arjun is now a Punjabi popstar who reunites the gang. Preet gets ghosted, Shahid meets the woman of his dreams while Arjun is caught with his pants down, by millions of people.

episodes.name: Baby Tu Toh Shark Hai
episodes.overview: Lavanya’s mother puts her foot in her champagne-filled mouth in front of Rishabh’s eggless-cake demanding parents which forces them to expedite their wedding plans. Arjun invites the gang to a big party where Preet hooks up with a filmstar with an extra K in his name. Shahid finds himself not on the guestlist. New lovers struggle to find space in the big city but find adventure instead.

episodes.name: Feel it, Fight it
episodes.overview: Arjun helps Lavanya with the wedding prep as her relationship with Rishabh cracks. Sheetal tries to run her fashion business from her cramped living room amidst the chaos of a bustling household. Yavar refuses to accept Melroy as his boyfriend in front of his friends. A trip to Mussoorie years ago becomes the picturesque backdrop to Lavanya’s first heartbreak and her new love story.

episodes.name: Blood Moon
episodes.overview: Arjun has a bizarre encounter with a fan in his hotel room. Lavanya asks her mother for relationship advice but immediately regrets it. Preet goes on a disastrous date with Kkrish, the filmstar. The girls figure that Zumba classes are for venting to your girlfriends. Yavar tells Melroy that his family is getting him married and the situation takes a dark turn.

episodes.name: Jawaniyaan
episodes.overview: Melroy lands up in hospital, his friends know he’s hiding the truth. Lavanya takes Rishabh on a date to bring the spark back. Preet exposes Krrish on social media. The friends sneak Melroy out of hospital and roam the city of their youth, reliving the city of their childhood. Rishabh’s business venture suffers a big loss, Lavanya is livid, but there’s more trouble in store for him.

episodes.name: Yaar Ki Shaadi
episodes.overview: A massive revelation on the news leaves Arjun devastated. His mother confronts a hidden truth. It’s the night of the sangeet and the friends celebrate like there’s no tomorrow. Preet meets someone who's instantly smitten by her. A night of celebration becomes a night of upheaval for the to-be bride and groom. In a moment of turmoil, Lavanya takes a step that will change the course of her life.

episodes.name: Stardust
episodes.overview: In the midst of a dreamy wedding to the love of her life, Lavanya is numb. Arjun puts up a brave front. Shahid takes a tough decision at work. Rishabh and Lavanya spend a tumultuous honeymoon while Arjun’s state of mind spirals down a rabbit hole. When it comes to taking the leap of faith, Preet gets cold feet. In the past, the kids uncover a secret but are they ready to face such darkness?

episodes.name: The Big 30
episodes.overview: Shahid's dream of his NGO school comes true but his friends don’t come through. Yavar begs Melroy to save him. Sheetal and Sameer’s marriage reaches a crossroad. A tryst with violence in the past ties the friends’ fates together but Preet’s 30th birthday party brings with it a revelation that throws them apart. As Rishabh’s life’s work burns to ashes, their life-long friendships are set ablaze.
